info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 28 at 5:14PM MDT until June 28 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Rapid City SD
info.description:
TORUNR
The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... South central Meade County in west central South Dakota... East central Pennington County in west central South Dakota...
* Until 545 PM MDT.
* At 513 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 3 miles southeast of Elm Springs, or 39 miles east of Rapid City, moving southeast at 40 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* This dangerous storm will be near... Creighton around 520 PM MDT.
This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota near Mile Marker 102, and between Mile Markers 107 and 108.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 5:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 5:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 5:45 PM MDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 5:45 PM MDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
